definition: polypeptide, chain of amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH, a component of protein
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)

sentences.english: AQUA peptides as identity standards for post-translational modifications.
sentences.chinese: AQUA多肽作为鉴定翻译后修饰的标准品。

sentences.english: The polypeptide patterns of the eggs of Anopheles sinensis and An. anthropophagus were compared with two-dimensional electrophoresis in polyacrylamide gel.
sentences.chinese: 用二维电泳法比较分析两种按蚊卵的蛋白质多肽图谱。

sentences.english: This is the webpage of Regulatory Peptides .
sentences.chinese: 这是《调节性多肽》杂志的网页。

sentences.english: This toxin is a class of monocyclic heptapeptides with many different isomerides.
sentences.chinese: 该毒素是一类具有多种异构体的环状多肽物质。

sentences.english: There were not obvious differences on the polypeptide compositions of thylakoid membrane.
sentences.chinese: 但类囊体膜的多肽组分并不存在明显的差异。

sentences.english: A computer program for DNA and polypeptide sequence analysis was made.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种DNA和多肽链序列分析的软件系统。

sentences.english: A peptides migration model based on the principle of mechanics is presented in capillary zone electrophoresis (CZE).
sentences.chinese: 提出了一个多肽在毛细管区带电泳的迁移模型。

sentences.english: Proteins are made up of one or more polypeptides. See peptide; denaturation; conjugated protein.
sentences.chinese: 蛋白质是由一条或多条多肽链组成。

sentences.english: The product prepared from the sipunculid polypeptide can be used for sports nutrition.
sentences.chinese: 由星虫多肽制备的产品可以在运动营养方面具有应用。

sentences.english: These polypeptides may optionally be used in combination with pneumococcal saccharides.
sentences.chinese: 这些多肽任选与肺炎球菌糖联用。

sentences.english: Plant defensins are cystein-rich antibacterial peptides.
sentences.chinese: 植物防御素，是另一类阳离子抗菌多肽。

sentences.english: Nucleic acids, polypeptides, and methods for modulating apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: 核酸，多肽，以及调节细胞凋亡的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the antibacterial-relative proteins and peptides in housefly larvae.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究家蝇幼虫体内与抗菌功能相关的蛋白和多肽。

sentences.english: Future work will no doubt find and confirm more of the brain's peptides.
sentences.chinese: 进一步的研究无疑施药发现或者证实存在更多的多肽。

sentences.english: Are the residues contiguous in the primary sequence of the polypeptide chain?
sentences.chinese: 这些残基在多肽链的一级结构上是连续的吗？

sentences.english: These amino acids are polymerized to form the growing polypeptide chain.
sentences.chinese: 这些氨基酸聚合在一起形成了伸长的多肽链。

definition: peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)
peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)/same as 肽[tai4]
polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
